subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Richard Paez resigned as Venezuela’s coach yesterday, saying he did not want to be an obstacle in his country’s attempt to qualify for its first World Cup. His resignation came less than a week after Venezuela beat Bolivia, 5-3, and moved in fifth place in South American World Cup qualifying. Four, and possibly five, teams will advance.
